page.title: 11Bishops Wood Nature Trail.
page.content: It was a lovely day as we walked around the nature trail.We saw lots of different trees,oak,birch,alder, beech,ash,holly and aspen.There were lots of examples of the different layers of woodland and of plants that liked different types of soil inc. those that liked damp ground, this was in an area where the drainage was poor.Bird nesting boxes had been put lots of the trees to encourage different birds,we heard more than we saw.We were able to look at a profile of soil and measure round the trunk of a huge tree.A man showed us a tool for taking a sample from a tree to tell its age.In the classroom we saw lots of interesting things, a stuffed badger as well as other creatures.It was all very interesting and not far from our school.(M.Dickson)
